# ===========================
#  STM32 / STM32CubeIDE .gitignore
# ===========================

# ---- Build output ----
Debug/
Release/
build/
*.elf
*.bin
*.hex
*.map
*.lst

# ---- Object files ----
*.o
*.d

# ---- IDE metadata ----
.settings/
.project
.cproject
.loadpath
*.launch

# ---- CubeMX / CubeIDE backups ----
*.mxproject
*.ioc-backup
*.bak

# ---- Auto-generated middleware docs ----
Middlewares/*/Documentation/

# ---- Log files ----
*.log

# ---- Editor / OS clutter ----
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
*~
*.swp
*.swo

# ---- Generated CMake (if using newer CubeIDE) ----
CMakeFiles/
cmake_install.cmake
CMakeCache.txt
Makefile
